STAFF.Text: María is a dedicated psychologist with 5 years of experience in the association. She enjoys reading and hiking in her free time.
Gabriela, a versatile member, brings a creative approach to our team. With a passion for painting and volunteering, she adds vibrancy to our projects.
Alejandro is a compassionate psychologist dedicated to helping others. With 3 years of service, he brings empathy and understanding to his work.
Laura, a dedicated volunteer, has been with us for 4 years. She enjoys gardening and organizing community events to foster connections.
Juan is committed to social care, bringing warmth and empathy to his interactions. He has been an integral part of our team for 2 years.
Carlos, our efficient administrative staff, keeps everything running smoothly. With 3 years of service, he ensures our operations are well-organized.
Valeria brings positivity and enthusiasm to our team. With a background in event planning and 2 years of service, she adds joy to our projects.
Luis is a reliable member of our administrative team. With attention to detail and 4 years of experience, he ensures our office functions efficiently.
Sofia, a dedicated doctor, provides compassionate care to our clients. With a background in public health and 3 years of service, she prioritizes patient well-being.
Daniel, a dynamic member, brings energy and creativity to our team. With a passion for photography and 2 years of service, he captures memorable moments.
Ana is a compassionate social care worker, dedicated to improving the lives of others. With 3 years of service, she goes above and beyond to support our community.
Diego is a dedicated psychologist, committed to mental health advocacy. With 5 years of experience, he brings empathy and understanding to his clients.
Mauricio is a caring social care worker, known for his kindness and patience. With 2 years of service, he creates a supportive environment for those in need.
Ricardo, our skilled doctor, provides quality healthcare with professionalism and care. With 4 years of experience, he ensures patient well-being.
Rick, our dedicated doctor, brings expertise and empathy to his practice. With 3 years of service, he makes a meaningful impact on our community.
